pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:5.1: 6. The training rule on exchanging what belongs to the Order
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.2: At that time, after collecting voluntary contributions with the aim of supplying robes for the Order of nuns, the lay followers stored the requisites in the house of a cloth merchant. They then went to the nuns and said,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.3: “Venerables, requisites to be used for robes are stored in the house of such-and-such a cloth merchant. Please have someone get cloth from that and then share it out.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.4: But the nuns exchanged those requisites for tonics, which they then used.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.5: When the lay followers found out about this, they complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:6.6: “When requisites belonging to the Order are designated for a specific purpose, how can the nuns exchange them for something else?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those lay disciples,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.2: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.4: “When requisites belonging to the Order are designated for a specific purpose, how can the nuns exchange them for something else?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.5: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.8: When requisites belonging to the Order are designated for a specific purpose, how can the nuns exchange them for something else?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.9: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:7.10: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:8.1: ‘When a requisite belonging to the Order is designated for a specific purpose, if a nun exchanges it for something else, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:10.1: A requisite […] is designated for a specific purpose:
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:10.2: it was given for a specific purpose.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:11.2: belonging to the Order, not to a group, not to an individual nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:12.2: if, apart from the purpose for which it was given, she gets something else in exchange, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:12.3: When she obtains it, it becomes subject to relinquishment.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:12.4: It is to be relinquished to the Order of nuns, a group, or an individual nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:12.5: “And, monks, it’s to be relinquished in this way.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:12.6: … ‘Venerables, this thing which I got in exchange for requisites belonging to the Order that was designated for another purpose is to be relinquished. I relinquish it to the Order.’
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:13.1: If it is for a specific purpose and she perceives that it is for a specific purpose, and she gets something else in exchanged for it, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:13.2: If it is for a specific purpose, but she is unsure if it is, and she gets something else in exchanged for it, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:13.3: If it is for a specific purpose, but she does not perceive that it is for a specific purpose, and she gets something else in exchanged for it, she commits an offense entailing relinquishment and confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:13.4: When she receives in return what had been relinquished, it is to be used in accordance with the intention of the donors.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:14.1: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she perceives that it is for a specific purpose, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:14.2: If it is not for a specific purpose, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:14.3: If it is not for a specific purpose, and she does not perceive that it is for a specific purpose, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:15.2: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np6:16.1: The sixth training rule is finished.
